wow u need to spend money wisely
is it better to buy it as a bundle or to buy each skin by itself

SKT T1 bundle has five skins for 3290RP, around 30AUD. Each skin individually is 750, 750X5=3750, so you save with the bundle.

That's the most expensive bundle, the others are cheaper still, so if you were planning to buy all the skins anyway then definitely get the bundle as it won't cost as much.

If you only want one or two skins, then of course buy them individually.

Also play a lot of ARAM's if you don't have the champions, it's cheaper cash wise to unlock the champions with IP and then unlock the skins with RP, as opposed to unlocking everything with RP. Unless you value your time, in which case RP all the way, although if you value your time you could probably find better entertainment elsewhere where you actually buy things instead of merely unlocking them at Riot's pleasure.

Does that help?
Running out of money riot..?

"In preparation for the Samsung White skins release, we’re taking all the previous championship skins out of the Legacy vault"
Riot does this annually every release of the following the Worlds skins. It's business, not desperation.

> It's business, not desperation.

Isn't that the same thing these days?
Well if Riot goes out of business then no more league, so I wouldn't criticise the decision.
who cares we get the skins again. Cheers riot

Going have to work double-time to get these 3 bundles, i have to say if you like them buy it if not then no point of wasting your money on something that you don't like, just save and wait till a skin that you really like comes up :D

PS: I tend to go overboard with skins lol but it's just me, everyone is different. 

Cheers Riot & to LOL Players

Regards Thomas.H
